ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | resqcld.1 | |- ( ph -> A e. RR ) |
| 2 |  | ltexp2d.2 | |- ( ph -> M e. ZZ ) |
| 3 |  | ltexp2d.3 | |- ( ph -> N e. ZZ ) |
| 4 |  | ltexp2d.4 | |- ( ph -> 1 < A ) |
| 5 |  | expcand.5 | |- ( ph -> ( A ^ M ) = ( A ^ N ) ) |
| 6 |  | #P_expcan | |- ( ( ( A e. RR /\ M e. ZZ /\ N e. ZZ ) /\ 1 < A ) -> ( ( A ^ M ) = ( A ^ N ) <-> M = N ) ) |
| 7 | 1, 2, 3, 4, 6 | #P_syl31anc | |- ( ph -> ( ( A ^ M ) = ( A ^ N ) <-> M = N ) ) |
| 8 | 5, 7 | #P_mpbid | |- ( ph -> M = N ) |
